name: PDFAnnotationButtonWidget
desc: A PDFAnnotationButtonWidget object provides user interactivity on a page of a PDF document. There are three types of buttons available: push button, radio button, and checkbox.DeprecatedUse PDFAnnotationSubtype instead.
